body.name: MINTHE™ Makeup Brush Cleaner Mat | 2 Pack | Silicone Makeup Brush Cleaning Mat, Make Up Brush Cleaner Pad, Makeup Brush Mat Cleaner, Makeup Cleaner, Make Up Brushes Cleaning
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins
features: Strong & Sturdy Suction: Our makeup brush cleaner is crafted from high-grade BPA-free silicone and is equipped with strong suction cups so you have multiple usage options, You can securely suction the make up brush cleaner pad to any sink for a mess free clean or due to the size you can snugly hold your makeup cleaner in your hand so you can also use on the go.

Optimized for Deep Cleaning: Featuring an array of bumps and grooves, our makeup brush cleaner mat provides thorough cleansing for all brush types. make up brushes cleaning is essential for healthy clean skin and for cosmetic application seeing as using Make up Brushes that have not been properly cleaned can cause skin problems such as spots and blemishes, so it is important to stay on top of this.

Versatile Cleaning Options: The MINTHE makeup brushes cleaner is Designed with convenience in mind, No more complicated cleaning routines! Simply apply your preferred cosmetic brush cleaner liquid / makeup brush washer solution to our makeup brush cleaning mat and gently work your brush against its surface. It's unique textures ensure every bristle is reached for a thorough clean.

Two for the Price of One: Each package comes with two premium makeup brush cleaners, ensuring you always have a backup makeup brush cleaning pad at your disposal. our makeup brush cleaner mat will meet all your brush cleaning needs and by having two you can keep one in your bathroom and take your other one on the go.

Perfect For Travel: Our silicone makeup brush cleaning mat has a compact design making it a lightweight & portable so you can take this make up brush cleaner tool wherever you go. The makeup brush cleanser also known as brush blender cleaner, makeup sponge cleaner, makeup brushes cleaner, paint puck brush cleaner, cosmetic brush cleaner, make up brush cleaner cleanser pad, make brush cleaners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I had some doubts because of how small they are but they actually perform really well. The suction cups were exceedingly well, and the dynamic design makes for easy cleaning of all brush sizes. I use them to clean all my makeup brushes as well as my face painting brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent at cleaning my makeup brushes!
reviews.reviewText: This brush cleaning mat is so helpful to me, and gets my brushes clean in half the time. My favourite part is the cluster of suction cups on the back of the mat that do a great job of keeping the mat in place as you work on the brushes. The suction cups stick to practically everything. The best part is that there are two mats in the box, so you always have a backup or one to share. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well for cleaning my brushes. Makes the job quicker and cleans them thoroughly. Should last a long time if taken care of. Definitely speeds things up if you’re cleaning a batch of multiple brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical that this product would work since I don't clean my brush a lot. This helps a lot. I was surprised that my brushes were more clean than ever and now I don't break out as easy. I recommend this to anyone else who deals with daily breakouts from using make up products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel or a small bathroom
reviews.reviewText: Love that this is small and easy to store. It suction cups to the sink so it doesn’t move around while using it. Works great for all my brushes, gets them good and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best brush cleaner ever
reviews.reviewText: My makeup brushes are WHITE again! This thing is amazing. Just use some dish soap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With a little facial cleanser and this silicone scrubber my makeup brushes look new again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Invaluable for cleaning artist's brushes too
reviews.reviewText: Invaluable for cleaning artist's brushes too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels like a good quality product. snug fit with my Blue Yeti microphone. I can't comment on durability since I have just received it. Time will tell but it is thick and seems of good quality. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewerName: Mr J J DaleMr J J Dale
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for cleaning brushes and the pad itself sticks inside the sink and doesnt move at all when cleaning, very strong suction!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does what it is supposed to.No fuss, easy to slip on, perfect fit.Supports sound quality and the packaging was minimal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels very sturdy and well designed! the suction cups are a good addition and the pad fits in my hand well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very Happy with these cleaning pads, the little bumps and grooves make it easy to clean the bristles of the brush and fits snug in your hand
